title: Lavender Honey Shortbread
recipe_html:
Butter-forward shortbread with lavender and wildflower honey.

Ingredients

  • Unsalted butter
  • Sugar
  • Flour
  • Lavender
  • Honey

Steps

  1. Cream butter + sugar.
  2. Fold in dry ingredients.
  3. Bake until golden.

title: Brown Butter Banana Bread
recipe_html:
Rich banana bread with browned butter and warm spices.

Ingredients

  • Bananas
  • Butter
  • Flour
  • Cinnamon
  • Eggs

Steps

  1. Brown the butter.
  2. Mix wet ingredients.
  3. Fold in dry and bake.

title: Citrus Olive Oil Cake
recipe_html:
Moist olive oil cake with citrus zest and a light glaze.

Ingredients

  • Olive oil
  • Orange zest
  • Flour
  • Eggs
  • Sugar

Steps

  1. Whisk wet ingredients.
  2. Fold in dry.
  3. Bake and glaze.
